mapper.select: SELECT usersCode, memberId, memberPwd, memberName, authority FROM member1 WHERE memberId=#{memberId} AND enabled=1
mapper.insert: insert into member1(usersCode, memberId, memberPwd, memberName, enabled, authority) values(#{usersCode}, #{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{enabled}, #{authority})

insert into member2(usersCode, help, email, birth, post, addr1, addr2, tel, joinDate, joinPath, loginDate, gradeCode) values(#{usersCode}, #{help}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{post}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{tel}, sysdate, #{joinPath}, #{loginDate}, 3)
